resources.string: Waiting for the beacon detection process
%1$s,\n%2$d detected beacon,\n%3$d content(s) attached to the beacon(s) on Adtag downloaded.
Congratulations! You manage the location permission! Next step is to learn to manage the bluetooth permission!
The application needs to access to your location to detect the beacons.
The application needs to access to your location to detect the beacons.\nPlease give the authorization from the application settings.
Ok, I give the application the location permisison.
The application needs to access to the bluetooth function to detect the beacons\nand will start it automatically when starting the application.
Ok, I give the application the bluetooth permission.
The application will automatically activate the bluetooth at start. Do you authorize the application to do it ?
